minigame.noir.tech.positive: PS1 HUD with techno-noir feel, bevel hints, chromatic micro-glow, orthographic, minimal grain, readably bold glyphs, transparent background
minigame.noir.tech.negative: photo, clutter, thin unreadable type, smear

minigame.candy.pop.positive: pixel-art candy UI, soft bevel, cute highlights, kawaii arcade tone, clean vector-like edges, transparent background

minigame.forest.cozy.positive: PS1-lofi UI panels with soft dither, mossy wood accents, gentle light, studio-clean icon silhouettes, transparent background, nostalgic console menu
minigame.forest.cozy.negative: photo, grunge noise, text watermark, harsh bloom

tex.psx.frames.positive: PS1-era UI frame texture atlas, seamless tiles, gentle dither, 256-color look, clean edges, designed for slicing into 9-slice borders

tex.psx.frames.soft.positive: PS1 soft UI frames, pastel edges, gentle bevels, seamless tiles, designed for slicing into 9-slice borders

tex.psx.frames.wood.positive: PS1 wood-textured UI frames, natural grain, warm tones, seamless tiles, designed for slicing into 9-slice borders

hud.soulslike.runes.positive: dark fantasy HUD rune icons, glowing ember outlines, crisp vector silhouettes, high contrast, readable at 48px, minimal grunge, UI icon sheet, transparent background
hud.soulslike.runes.negative: realistic photo, text, watermark, busy background, lowres

hud.kawaii.icons.positive: kawaii HUD icons, cute silhouettes, soft edges, pastel colors, readable at 48px, minimal noise, transparent background
hud.kawaii.icons.negative: realistic, dark, harsh edges, busy background

hud.cozy.icons.positive: cozy HUD icons, warm silhouettes, soft edges, earth tones, readable at 48px, minimal noise, transparent background
hud.cozy.icons.negative: realistic, bright, harsh edges, busy background

char.psx.hunk.positive: PS1-style male character portrait, handsome features, strong jawline, confident expression, limited color palette, nostalgic console look

char.psx.waifu.positive: PS1-style female character portrait, cute features, soft expression, kawaii style, limited color palette, nostalgic console look

char.psx.neutral.positive: PS1-style neutral character portrait, balanced features, calm expression, limited color palette, nostalgic console look
char.psx.neutral.negative: photoreal, modern, extreme features, harsh expression

gen.jsfxr.male.positive: masculine sound effects, deep tones, strong impact, electronic elements

gen.jsfxr.female.positive: feminine sound effects, bright tones, soft impact, melodic elements

gen.jsfxr.neutral.positive: neutral sound effects, balanced tones, moderate impact, natural elements
